Title: Laxmii
Director: Lawrence Raghavendra, Lawrence Raghavendra, Balakrishnan Thevar(co-director)
Writer: Farhad Samji (adapted screenplay), Farhad Samji (dialogue), Lawrence Raghavendra (screenplay), Sparsh Khetarpal, Tasha Bhambra
Actors: Akshay Kumar, Kiara Advani, Sharad Kelkar, Ashwini Kalsekar
Plot: The film deals with a ghost seeking vengeance for being wronged and haunts everyone who is staying in the house.
